call_to_action.title: Helping Ayurvedic Doctors live their Entreprenurial dream
call_to_action.description: Our network is only available to BAMS qualified doctors and not to any other healthcare practitioner. We are dedicated to enabling vaidyas who have chosen the Ayurvedic medical system to creat their own success sotry.

params.footer_description: We invite you to explore the services we offer and see how Apna Health can help you increase your profits and spread the word about your clinic.
